short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark Organizer is a tool that organizes your past bookmarks and makes saving Book Marks easy and user friendly. .

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark Organizer is a tool that organizes your past bookmarks and makes saving Book Marks easy and user friendly. It creates image snapshots of  Bookmarks and allows you move them easily via dragging the images from folder to folder. You can now visually see all the sites you saved and easily save them to folders using your mouse
